inicio.descripcion: Eager for knowledge and passionate about software development.

sobremi.parrafo1: Passionate about web development with JavaScript and mobile development for iOS
sobremi.parrafo2: Constantly looking to learn and grow in these areas, keeping knowledge up to date with the latest trends through university and personal projects.

experiencia.descripcion1: Development of university and personal projects with Mobile First approach and emphasis on correct semantics and web optimization.
experiencia.descripcion2: Development of personal projects with React using Vite.js and Tailwind CSS. Some examples include the creation of a Task Manager and an E-commerce with test API integration.
experiencia.descripcion3: Experience in BackEnd development with Node, applying full CRUD operations and establishing connection via REST API.
experiencia.descripcion4: Experience in algorithm development and neural network programming for the implementation of artificial intelligence models.
experiencia.descripcion5: Initial experience in mobile development with Swift, applying knowledge in the creation of a project that replicates the iPhone calculator.
experiencia.descripcion6: SQL programming experience and a strong proficiency in modeling and creating databases, both relational and non-relational.

proyectos.descripcion1: Website template oriented to buy and sell Cryptocurrencies
proyectos.descripcion3: QR Code Generator from a URL or String
proyectos.descripcion4: Information on the planets of the Solar System
proyectos.descripcion6: Server of a university evidence system
